title: Trump tips hand on controversial GOP memo
text:
Trump tips hand on controversial GOP memo 9:48am EST - 01:27 
After the State of the Union, President Donald Trump was overheard saying that he ''100%'' plans to release a controversial memo alleging the FBI abused its surveillance tools. Havovi Cooper reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
After the State of the Union, President Donald Trump was overheard saying that he "100%" plans to release a controversial memo alleging the FBI abused its surveillance tools. Havovi Cooper reports.
